import React from"react";/**
 * Asking component for proposing the Valentine's Day question.
 *
 * @param {string} gif - The URL or import path of the chosen gif.
 * @param {string} altText - The alt text for the displayed gif.
 * @param {function} handleAccept - Callback function for accepting the proposal.
 * @param {function} handleReject - Callback function for rejecting the proposal.
 * @param {string} noButtonText - The text to be displayed on the rejection button.
 * @returns {JSX.Element} JSX element representing the Asking component.
 */import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Asking=_ref=>{let{gif,altText,handleAccept,handleReject,noButtonText}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"asking-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"App-gif",src:gif,alt:altText}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"App-text",children:"Hi Ellie, it has been a wonderful month even though we are apart."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"App-text",children:"It is silly to ask again, but I love you so much."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"App-text",children:"Ellie, will you be my Valentine?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"App-button",onClick:handleAccept,"aria-label":"Accept and be my Valentine",children:"Yes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"App-button",onClick:handleReject,"aria-label":"Reject with message: ".concat(noButtonText),children:noButtonText})]})]});};export default Asking;
